content.title: 🌟 FUNDED IN 5 MINUTES, 3158% IN 24 HOURS! 🥳 UNLOCKED 12 HOURS EXTENSION FOR LAUNCHDAY PRICES! UNLOCKED SOLDR DIY & SOLDR ORIGINAL AS ADD-ONS!
content.creator:
SNRGY Studios
March 21, 2025
content.content:
❤️ Hello dear Backers! 
We are absolutely thrilled to announce that thanks to your incredible support, we’ve far surpassed our Kickstarter goal! 🌟
Within just 24 hours, we broke the $200,000 barrier! 🚀
This milestone means the world to us, and it’s all because of you. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you! 
💥 But there’s more, a new incredible surprise is coming…
Launchday prices are extended for 12 more hours! 
Launch-day prices end: Friday, March 21 at 06:59 AM CET and there will not be any other extension after that point.
New Add-ons are available! 
Some backers wanted to mix and match rewards -we now make that possible by introducing SOLDR DIY EDITION add-on and SOLDR ORIGINAL EDITION add-on, available at the checkout.
⚠️ Please note -if you are a backer please confirm your email through our survey!
Since you've already backed us, we'd love your help!
By filling out the 1-minute quick surveywe shared with you directly on Kickstarter messages, we can make sure you receive only backer-exclusive updates and rewards—while skipping promotional emails meant for non-backers.
Just click the link we sent to your private messages here on Kickstarter, 
or click here.
🤔 HOW DO I MODIFY MY PLEDGE?
To include new rewards or add more add-ons, some might wish to modify their pledge. How do you modify your pledge? It’s easy!

1. Click the "Manage your pledge" button on our campaign page.
2. Click "Change your pledge"
3. Either add a reward you want, change your add-on or just adjust your pledge amount to include the cost of the add-ons you'd like. After the campaign, you’ll specify your choices in the survey.
4. Click "Confirm changes"
If you have questions, don’t hesitate to reach out!
💵 EARN CASH WHILE SPREADING THE WORD
Join our Kickbooster referral programand earn a commission for every pledge made through your unique link. Help us reach our stretch goals while making some extra cash!

Click here to sign up through Kickbooster today.
💬 We’d love for you to become part of our growing community
If you haven't already, join our SOLDR Development Group to: 

● Get exclusive updates and sneak peeks.
● Share your ideas and feedback.
● Connect with other amazing backers like you!

Click here to join the group now!
❤️ Thank You Again! 🌟
You’ve helped turn our vision into reality, and we couldn’t be more grateful. Let’s
keep this momentum going and achieve even more together!

With heartfelt thanks,
TEAM SOLDR
